questiontext.text: 88% of boys in high schools had a side job during the summer. For girls at the same schools, the percentage is 82%. A researcher takes two random samples: one among boys and the other among girls. Each sample contains 500 students. What is an approximate distribution of the difference between the proportions of these two samples?

answer.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.06 and standard error of 0.017.

feedback.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.06 and standard error of 0.017…: Incorrect

answer.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.06 and standard error of 0.018.

feedback.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.06 and standard error of 0.018…: Incorrect

answer.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.06 and standard error of 0.023.

feedback.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.06 and standard error of 0.023…: Correct

answer.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.06 and standard error of 0.035.

feedback.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.06 and standard error of 0.035…: Incorrect
